Name: echo ${array[@]}
Description: Print all values of an array as separate values

Name: echo ${!array[@]}
Description: Print all keys of an array as separate values

Name: echo ${array[*]}
Description: Print all values of an array as one space separated string

Name: echo ${!array[*]}
Description: Print all keys of an array as one space separated string

Name: echo ${array[2]}
Description: Print only index 2 of the array

Name: echo ${array[-2]}
Description: Print only second to last index of the array

Name: echo ${array[@]:2}
Description: Print all the values starting at index 2

Name: echo ${#array[3]}
Description: Print the length of the 3rd element
